scale: Near, personal space; Table; Large surface
evaluation: Technical evaluation (e.g., runtime, roundtrip); Quality measurements (e.g., accuracy of tracking)
contribution_desc: Presents a system where users swipe content between devices on a table. Uses IMU, vibration motors, speakers, and microphones to sense gestures on the shared surface.
tracking_characteristic: Positioning left/right; Direction of interaction;Direction ; Inside-out tracking
